articles.title: PSA: Your Samsung Galaxy phone has a security update you should install right now - Mashable
articles.description: The update fixes a bug that would allow attackers to take over your phone.

articles.title: Snap unveils Snap OS 2.0 with native browser, WebXR support, and more - TechCrunch
articles.description: The launch comes as the company rolled out its fifth-generation Snap Spectacles for developers last year and plans to launch a consumer version sometime in 2026.

articles.title: Super Mario Galaxy + Super Mario Galaxy 2 to offer mouse controls on Nintendo Switch 2 - Nintendo Everything
articles.description: Nintendo has now confirmed mouse control support for Super Mario Galaxy + Super Mario Galaxy 2 on Switch 2 with the Joy-Con 2.

articles.title: React is winning by default and slowing innovation - Hacker News

articles.description: Other features include a call screening assistant, a new gaming and preview app, in-app translation across the system, and updates to Genmoji and Image Playground apps.

articles.title: Metroid Prime 4: Beyond Is Up for Preorder, Out December 4 - IGN
articles.description: Everything you need to know to preorder Metroid Prime 4: Beyond for Nintendo Switch or Switch 2, including how much it costs, where to find it, and more.

articles.title: The unbearable sameness of Liquid Glass - The Verge
articles.description: Apple’s new cross-platform design system, Liquid Glass, is coming to iPhone, Watch, and more. But its Vision Pro-inspired design doesn’t work everywhere.

articles.title: Apple releases macOS Tahoe 26 with more powerful Spotlight search and its own Phone app - The Verge
articles.description: The last major macOS update for Intel-based Macs brings new translation capabilities and Apple Intelligence features.

articles.title: watchOS 26 is now available with a new wrist flick gesture and Notes on your wrist - The Verge
articles.description: First announced at WWDC 2025, watchOS 26 is now available and brings new health features, translation capabilities, and gestures.

articles.description: After a viral AI trend, Gemini is ahead of ChatGPT on app store rankings.

articles.title: Apple Stock Rises Amid Strong iPhone 17 Preorders - Investor's Business Daily
articles.description: Apple stock climbed Monday after Wall Street analysts noted strong preorders for the company's iPhone 17 series smartphones.

articles.description: Following the launch of Donkey Kong Bananza: DK Island & Emerald Rush, here's a review of the new DLC.

articles.description: Ahead of watchOS 26 being released today, Apple has enabled the new Hypertension Notifications feature on compatible Apple Watch models in the U.S....

articles.title: Silksong's surprise release was "a little callous", says Hell is Us creative director - Eurogamer
articles.description: Hell is Us creative director Jonathan Jacques-Belletête called the surprise release of Hollow Knight: Silksong "a little callous".

articles.description: More users will be able to use advanced and personalized AI in their daily lives, taking one more step further towards AI democratization
